resources.string: Allows assessment notifications to be sent from the schedule app.
You have an assessment today! Check the Student Scheduler for more information.
You have a new course today! Check the Student Scheduler for more information.
Your course is ending today! Check the Student Scheduler for more information.
You have a term course today! Check the Student Scheduler for more information.
Your term is ending today! Check the Student Scheduler for more information.
Allows course start notifications to be sent from the schedule app.
Allows course end notifications to be sent from the schedule app.
Allows term start notifications to be sent from the schedule app.
Allows term end notifications to be sent from the schedule app.
